mega_menu.platform_desc: Infrastructure for next-gen gaming: from engine to mobile apps.
mega_menu.v3_desc: We updated the network protocol for 4K broadcasts.
mega_menu.anti_trust_desc: Real-time analysis of behavior patterns and clicks.
mega_menu.neural_guard_desc: AI detects engine hints on the fly.
mega_menu.fair_play_desc: How we ensure a fair environment.
mega_menu.global_id_desc: Sync your real achievements with your profile.
mega_menu.verified_titles_desc: Special badges for GM, IM, FM.

hero.subtitle: The future of the chess industry: WebRTC gaming, deep profile/settings customization, and one-click FIDE global rating integration.

sitemap.title: Ecosystem Map
sitemap.subtitle: Architecture of sections, subdomains, and ChessView services
sitemap.market_desc: Marketplace for skins, boards, animations, and NFTs.
sitemap.labs_desc: Experimental AI engines and beta analysis features.
sitemap.status_desc: Monitoring server uptime and network nodes.
sitemap.footer: © 2026 ChessView Infrastructure Architecture • All systems operational

profile.title: Elite Profiles
profile.desc: Forget boring avatars. We are introducing animated banners, profile special effects, and deep game customization.
profile.sync_desc: Once verified, your public FIDE rating will update automatically.

presence.desc: We are bringing emotions back to chess. See and hear your opponent in real-time via WebRTC.

tech.title: Technological Superiority
tech.desc: Systems that make the game not just entertainment, but a sport.
tech.bento_antitrust_desc: Anti-Cheat system that analyzes behavior patterns and gameplay to detect unfair play.
tech.bento_edge_desc: Load will be distributed across multiple servers to ensure fast and stable gameplay.
tech.bento_global_desc: Real-time analytics and low-latency nodes for seamless worldwide connection.

clubs.title: Your club — your rules
clubs.desc: Create private spaces for friends or join elite communities. Voice chats, private tournaments, and unique aesthetics for every room.
clubs.feature_interiors_desc: Choose lighting, board materials, and background music for your club.
clubs.feature_hierarchy_desc: Manage access, appoint moderators, and create your club's history.

roadmap.title: Roadmap 2026
roadmap.desc: Our journey from prototype to global ecosystem
roadmap.phase1_desc: Architecture design and WebRTC protocol development.
roadmap.phase2_desc: Anti-Cheat launch and improvement of security and game settings.
roadmap.phase2_item3: Implementation of Real-Time WebRTC and streams
roadmap.phase3_desc: Mobile applications and visual assets marketplace.

discord.title: Join Our Discord
discord.subtitle: The First Step To Becoming a ChessView Member is Joining Our Discord Community!
discord.text: We have ongoing development operations and system updates that you can monitor with our community. Get real-time notifications, access to private channels, and collaborate with other players.

footer.desc: We are reimagining the classics by integrating neural networks and WebRTC into the very core of chess. Play on a platform where fairness is the top priority.
footer.newsletter_desc: Get notified about new features and tournaments.
